thread.section_title: Apviexpress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Apviexpress | apviexpress.com
thread.title: Jay Markiewicz

author: Jay Markiewicz
title: Jay Markiewicz
text: I started my Visa process with other agencies who were unable to answer my questions, nor clarify the process, resulting in several dead ends. I was more confused and frustrated. Then I found APVI. APVI worked with me individually, directed me on how to complete the appropriate paperwork, then walked me through the process answering all of my question. They were a true partner in the process! Highly recommend.
